thread.title: Excellent sleep and service for the money!!!
thread.title_full: Excellent sleep and service for the money!!! - Review of Premier Inn London Hendon (The Hyde) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: F0glelady
title: Excellent sleep and service for the money!!!
text: This was our first time staying at a Premier Inn. I would compare the hotel to a Holiday Inn in the USA, however the quietness and the bed comfort would compare to a five star hotel. The staff was over the top friendly and helpful! The British are doing things right!!!
